"Inanna": "<%me>. Please excuse my contacting you so suddenly."
"Greetings. My name is Inanna. I am ARKS's Challenge Quest Administrator."
"You may have already used it, but I would like to inform you about <c bb0000>our \"Challenge Quest\" training program<c>."
"Challenge Quests are VR training exercises designed to improve ARKS members' skills."
"If you are interested, please use a teleporter to come to a Challenge Block. I will tell you about them in detail."
